PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-19782009-12-10PWGS,  ,  ,  , 
ActDepartment of Public Works and Government Services Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Esquimalt Graving Dock Regulations, 1989
PrecisRegulations Amending the ESQUIMALT GRAVING DOCK REGULATIONS, 1989 in order to achieve recovery of government's direct and indirect costs from operating the facility and to support the capital reinvestment required for the facility. This is required to support the continued operation of the dry dock as a common use facility.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0324 Publication Date: 2009-12-23
AttachmentsAttachment

This is required to support the continued operation of the dry dock as a common use facility.
